short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The single purpose of the extension is to provide users with easy access to popular games.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Play popular games like Sudoku, Mahjong, Tic Tac Toe, Match 4, Chess, Color Block, Checkers and Solitaire from your browser. Easily learn new games or brush up your skills with easy-to-follow instructions. 

How to use the widget:
1. Click the puzzle icon on the toolbar, then click on Games Universe to open the widget
2. Select the game you want to play
3. Read the instructions on the play screen and start playing

Want to share feedback? Please fill out this form and help us improve the product for you: https://gamesuniverse.co/contactus

You can uninstall this product at any time. Please follow the instructions here: https://gamesuniverse.co/uninstall
